reviewText: Enjoyed the Best of Color episodes of Combat so very much.  However, I am just as pleased with the black/white (or as my grandaughter would say "black/white and gray) epispdes.  I plan to collect them all.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Four fantastic COMBAT episodes in glorious colour!Yes the black and white episodes are gritty,fantastic and terrific.However the colour episodes represented on this dvd are worth a definite viewing!The standout episode is HEADCOUNT where the squad have to transport a horde of captured German soldiers back to the American lines.Jan Merlin is outstanding as the leader of the Germans and the squad are under constant pressure as the prisoners try every trick in the book in an attempt to escape.Also THE BROTHERS with fine acting by Sal Mineo is a must see!Buy this dvd and then maybe buy the entire series!
Title: N/A

reviewText: IF YOU LIKE COMBAT YOU MUST TRY TO SEE EVERY AVAILABLE EPISODE IN COLOR.  IT COMES ALIVE!  DONT MISS THEM.  MAKES A DIFFERENCE
Title: N/A

reviewText: I got this along with "the best of Saunders" and "the best of Hanson" for late night watching.  This show was really big when I was young and kids could still play Army with realistic looking toy guns.  the episodes on these collections are great and I still like the black and white episodes, but the color ones are OK too.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Combat- Has always been great stories for me since 9 years old. I have always been interested in the history of war and also the feelings of the men and women who fought for our freedom.
